==================

  * Removed require("connect/utils")

0.1.1 / 2010-07-27
==================

  * Added support for bodyDecoder / connect-form to coexist

0.1.0 / 2010-07-14
==================

  * Changed api:
    - use `form.complete(function(){})` instead of `form.onComplete = function(){}`
